alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Hamilton; Howard; Madison; Tipton (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 12:28PM EDT until April 05 at 1:00PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Madison County in central Indiana... Northwestern Delaware County in east central Indiana... Eastern Howard County in central Indiana... Northeastern Hamilton County in central Indiana... Tipton County in central Indiana... * Until 100 PM EDT. * At 1228 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Swayzee to 6 miles north of Georgetown, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Elwood around 1245 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Frankton, Alexandria, Orestes and Summitville. This includes Interstate 69 between mile markers 245 and 252. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM EDT for central and east central Indiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
